resources.string: Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now.
Geofence service is not available now. Go to Settings>Location>Mode and choose High accuracy.
Your app has registered too many geofences.
You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call.
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \\\'my location\\\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.</string>

This sample requires location permission to enable the \\\'my location\\\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \\\'Google Maps API Demos\\\'.
